biocontainers.name: iva
biocontainers.summary: Iva is a de novo assembler designed to assemble virus genomes that have no repeat sequences, using illumina read pairs sequenced from mixed populations at extremely high and variable depth.

biotools.summary: IVA is a de novo assembler designed to assemble virus genomes that have no repeat sequences, using Illumina read pairs sequenced from mixed populations at extremely high and variable depth.

bioschemas.name: IVA
bioschemas.summary: IVA is a de novo assembler designed to assemble virus genomes that have no repeat sequences, using Illumina read pairs sequenced from mixed populations at extremely high and variable depth.
